ISSUE.TITLE: When opening a dashboard, each widget uses its own default value
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary Current behavior: when opening a dashboard, each widget uses its own default value. Expected behavior: a single value will be picked and used for all widgets. ### Steps to Reproduce Visit: https://redash-preview.netlify.com/dashboard/wrong-parameter-example. Note that the parameter value is "value1", but the second widget is actually using "value2": ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/71468/58582289-13101780-825a-11e9-8e1b-6fba73ddea5f.png)
